content.question: ​If <math alttext="log subscript a b equals 4"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mi>a</mi></msub><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="a greater than 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="b greater than 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, what is the value of <math alttext="log subscript a squared end subscript open parentheses b cubed close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msub><mfenced><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
